Lyric:
[by:我跟你说个春天]
[01:02.94]What would I do without your smart mouth 
[01:06.89]Drawing me in, and you kicking me out 
[01:10.65]Got my head spinning, no kidding, I can't pin you down 
[01:18.46]What's going on in that beautiful mind 
[01:22.27]I'm on your magical mystery ride  
[01:26.31]And I'm so dizzy, don't know what hit me, but I'll be alright 
[01:34.74]My head's under water 
[01:38.23]But I'm breathing fine 
[01:42.53]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind 
[01:48.24]Cause all of me 
[01:51.30]Loves all of you  
[01:55.28]Love your curves and all your edges 
[01:59.60]All your perfect imperfections 
[02:02.94]Give your all to me  
[02:06.79]I'll give my all to you 
[02:10.62]You're my end and my beginning 
[02:14.54]Even when I lose I'm winning 
[02:18.45]Cause I give you all, all of me 
[02:26.20]And you give me all, all of you, oh 
[03:06.93]How many times do I have to tell you  
[03:10.72]Even when you're crying you're beautiful too  
[03:14.54]The world is beating you down, I'm around through every mood  
[03:22.28]You're my downfall, you're my muse 
[03:26.30]My worst distraction, my rhythm and blues  
[03:30.00]I can't stop singing, it's ringing, in my head for you  
[03:38.56]My head's under water  
[03:42.80]But I'm breathing fine
[03:46.26]You're crazy and I'm out of my mind 
[03:52.14]Cause all of me 
[03:55.13]Loves all of you  
[03:59.40]Love your curves and all your edges  
[04:02.95]All your perfect imperfections  
[04:06.97]Give your all to me  
[04:10.61]I'll give my all to you  
[04:14.47]You're my end and my beginning 
[04:18.44]Even when I lose I'm winning 
[04:22.12]Cause I give you all of me  
[04:29.89]And you give me all, all of you, oh
